results.title: Simvastatin induces apoptosis of cultured rat cardiomyocytes.
results.text_hl: Increased intracellular enzymatic activity of creatine phosphokinase, aldolase, and lactic dehydrogenase, markers for normal cell function, could reflect the @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@hypertrophic@@@ effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin induces regression of cardiac hypertrophy and fibrosis and improves cardiac function in a transgenic rabbit model of human hypertrophic cardiomyopathy.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ induces regression of @DISEASE_Cardiomegaly @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@ and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ and improves cardiac function in a transgenic @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbit@@@ model of @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@hypertrophic cardiomyopathy@@@.

results.title: Lovastatin prevents angiotensin II-induced cardiac hypertrophy in cultured neonatal rat heart cells.
results.text_hl: Primary cultures of neonatal cardiac myocytes were used to determine whether @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_25675 @@@HMG-CoA reductase@@@ inhibitors, @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ inhibit the @GENE_AGT @GENE_24179 @@@angiotensin II@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@hypertrophic@@@ growth.

citations.NLM: Oi S, Haneda T, Osaki J, Kashiwagi Y, Nakamura Y, Kawabe J, Kikuchi K. Lovastatin prevents angiotensin II-induced cardiac hypertrophy in cultured neonatal rat heart cells. Eur J Pharmacol. 1999 Jul 2;376(1-2):139-48. PMID: 10440099
